entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
